name: Custom Login Page Logo
author: Horendra Pal Singh Kandari

sections.description:
“Custom Login Page Logo” is a very light weight, handy, easy to use, simple layout plugin that lets you change wordpress logo that you see on login page.

When you create your website, the wordpress uses it’s own logo for login page (wp-admin) which looks very unprofessional but when you use this plugin then you can add your own logo of the company/agency which looks more professional and match with your brand.

You can always change it whenever you want.

Features

  • Very light weight, handy, easy to use, simple layout.
  • Secure, Translation ready ( English and Hindi only ).
  • Can change wordpress default login page Logo.
  • Can add logo height and width with unit.
  • Can add link to the logo for redirect to anywhere on the web.
  • Can add shadow to the logo.
  • Can add logo padding.
  • Can add logo border radius.
  • Doesn’t impact on your website speed.

Translation

This plugin is translation ready for English and Hindi language.
sections.installation:
From WordPress.org

  1. Download “custom login page logo” plugin.
  2. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.

From Admin dashboard

  1. Simply go to the Plugins admin menu
  2. Click on Add New Plugin
  3. In the search plugins type custom login page logo horendra
  4. When you find it, click on Install and activate
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

  1. Just install and activate the plugin.
  2. After that you will get a admin menu “Login Logo”, click there.
  3. Click on upload logo and a media uploader popup will appear.
  4. Select your logo and choose appropriate settings.
  5. Save changes

That’s it, next time when you login with wp-admin you will get a new logo

How to uninstall the plugin?

  1. Go to Plugins admin menu.
  2. Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

Do you offer support?

YES, For support or inquiries, please fill out the following form

Is this pugin translation ready?

YES, this plugin is translation ready for the following languages:-

  1. English (Default)
  2. Hindi

If you want this plugin in your language then you can contact me via this contact form.

  • Update Translation file

1.3

  • Add height and width including unit for Logo
  • Improve coding and functionality
  • Update Translation file

1.2

  • Translation ready

1.1

  • Compatible to wordpress 6.6.1.
  • Description updated

1.0

  • Plugin released.

short_description: A simple, secure and very light weight plugin to change wordpress logo that you see on the login page (wp-admin) with rich features.

screenshots.caption: Initially screen of the plugin page when there is no logo is uploaded (screenshot-1.png)
Upload a logo with media uploader (screenshot-2.png)
Image URL is displayed inside the input field (screenshot-3.png)
Once saved, the logo will be displayed on the plugin page (screenshot-4.png)
Once saved, the logo will be displayed on the wp-admin page too (screenshot-5.png)
